trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Bhurborlor is running dangerously low on medicine for the injured.
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_TODO_00<tab>Collect a pile of alpine seeds.
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_TODO_02<tab>Collect a clump of mountain herbmoss.
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the alpine seeds, urqobombyx larva, and mountain herbmoss to Bhurborlor.
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_000<tab>You there, outsider! I have run dangerously low on ingredients for the concoction of essential medicine. Could I trouble you to go and fetch more?
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_002<tab>While our size and strength is far greater than any visitor, there are no few of us that still fear injury and sickness.

TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_004<tab>I would send you to acquire three things: alpine seeds, an urqobombyx larva, and a good handful of mountain herbmoss. Fortunately, I believe they can all be harvested up the hill north of here.
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_005<tab>Journey up the hill to the north and you should be able to find alpine seeds, mountain herbmoss, and at least one urqobombyx larva without much difficulty.
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_010<tab>Did you have any trouble finding everything?
TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_011<tab>I am truly in your debt, outsider. Likewise, my kin will surely rest easy knowing the medicine supply has been replenished.

TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_012<tab>When Valigarmanda escaped its prison of ice, I confess I feared our doom to be imminent. But not only did you and yours swiftly end its rampage, the puissant healing magicks of your blue-clad companion saved a great many lives.

TEXT_KINGZB105_05045_BHURBORLOR_000_013<tab>Rest assured, the ingredients you brought today will be put to good use preparing medicine for those still convalescing. Truly, our people cannot thank you enough!
